chunks.content: Aditya Auto Products is a global Tier 1 automotive supplier, specializing in mechatronic systems, sheet metal assemblies, and precision plastic components. With a commitment to innovation and quality, we are leveraging Industry 4.0 technologies to enhance operational efficiency and maintain our competitive edge.

The Industry 4.0 Internship Program is a 6-month opportunity to gain hands-on experience in transforming manufacturing processes through data-driven solutions. Interns will work with the Production, Industrial Engineering, and Manufacturing Engineering Teams to ensure seamless integration of production data and its visualization.

Ensure all 10 assembly lines are consistently providing data into a centralized server SQL database.
Collaborate with teams to identify critical data points for production and quality tracking.
Develop and deploy interactive dashboards using Power BI to convert the data lake into live production insights.
Set up automated workflows and alerts for real-time monitoring of production metrics.

Analyze data trends to recommend improvements in production and operational processes.
Document technical procedures and present solutions to stakeholders.

Experience in live data integration from manufacturing or IoT systems.
Familiarity with DAX (Data Analysis Expressions) for advanced Power BI functionalities.
Understanding of production workflows and key manufacturing metrics.
Knowledge of scripting languages like Python for data processing.

Hands-on experience with real-world Industry 4.0 projects in a manufacturing environment.
Mentorship from experienced professionals in data analytics and manufacturing.
Exposure to cutting-edge technologies and tools for digital transformation.
Networking opportunities and potential for a full-time role upon successful completion of the internship.

Aditya Auto Products is a global Tier 1 automotive supplier at the forefront of innovation in mechatronic systems, sheet metal assemblies, and precision plastic components. We are committed to maintaining the highest standards of quality through data-driven insights and advanced analytics.

The Statistical Quality Data Scientist Internship is a 6-month program designed for exceptional talent eager to apply advanced statistical and data science techniques to real-world quality challenges. Interns will work on analyzing warranty returns data to drive actionable insights and predictive models for improving customer satisfaction.

Analyze raw warranty returns data from customer-provided Excel files, transforming it into a standardized, analyzable format.
Incorporate engineering team insights into data models to enhance the depth and accuracy of analyses.
Design and develop automated dashboards and graphs using Power BI or similar tools to visualize quality trends for each customer (six dashboards in total).

Apply Weibull Analysis to develop predictive algorithms for forecasting future warranty trends based on historical data.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand quality issues and recommend data-driven solutions.
Present findings and dashboards to stakeholders, ensuring alignment with quality improvement goals.
Ability to synthesize data insights into actionable recommendations.

Aditya Auto Products is a global Tier 1 automotive supplier delivering innovative mechatronic solutions for the automotive industry. We specialize in high-performance motors and actuators for various applications, continuously advancing our capabilities through cutting-edge technology.

The AI/ML Acoustic Diagnostics Internship is an elite 6-month program aimed at solving real-world challenges using artificial intelligence and machine learning. Interns will work on developing an AI system capable of analyzing and classifying motor audio signals, ensuring superior quality and customer satisfaction.

Knowledge of digital signal processing (DSP) and acoustic diagnostics.
Familiarity with edge computing and deploying AI models in real-time systems.
Hands-on experience in data visualization tools and model explainability.
Understanding of automotive motor systems and components.
** Selected candidates will be allocated to one of these roles according to their fitment and business needs **

Data Intern 
Data Analyst/Data Scientist Intern

Analog Devices, Inc. (NASDAQ: ADI) is a global semiconductor leader that bridges the physical and digital worlds to enable breakthroughs at the Intelligent Edge. ADI combines analog, digital, and software technologies into solutions that help drive advancements in digitized factories, mobility, and digital healthcare, combat climate change, and reliably connect humans and the world
. With revenue of more than $12 billion in FY22 and approximately 25,000 people globally working alongside 125,000 global customers, ADI ensures today’s innovators stay Ahead of What’s Possible.

Location: Bangalore, India
Overview:

Software Engineer Intern
Location: Bengaluru 
Mode: Onsite Internship 
Duration: July 2025 to Jun 2025 extendable to another 6 months based on business needs & Intern performance
POSITION OVERVIEW
Emerson (NI is now part of Emerson) is seeking Software Engineer Interns to work on design and development of test frameworks, algorithms, platforms and software products developed by Emerson

. The primary responsibilities in this position include working with development teams to define, document, design, deploy code & infrastructure components that help release NI products on time and with high quality.
Mtech Intern - Weather Radar

As an Mtech Intern - Weather Radar here at Honeywell, you will have the opportunity to work on cutting-edge weather radar technologies and contribute to the development of innovative solutions. This internship will provide you with hands-on experience in radar signal processing, data analysis, algorithm development, and embedded software
. You will work closely with our team of experts to gain valuable insights into the field of weather radar and contribute to the advancement of our products.
You will report directly to our Weather Radar Team Lead and work out of our Hyderabad location on a hybrid work schedule.

In this role, you will have the opportunity to:
- Gain practical experience in weather radar technology and its applications
- Work on real-world projects and contribute to the development of radar algorithms and embedded software
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to analyze radar data and provide insights

•   Excellent communication and teamwork abilities


ABOUT HONEYWELL

Honeywell International Inc. (Nasdaq: HON) invents and commercializes technologies that address some of the world’s most critical challenges around energy, safety, security, air travel, productivity, and global urbanization

. We are a leading software-industrial company committed to introducing state-of-the-art technology solutions to improve efficiency, productivity, sustainability, and safety in high-growth businesses in broad-based, attractive industrial end markets. Our products and solutions enable a safer, more comfortable, and more productive world, enhancing the quality of life of people around the globe.

.


THE BUSINESS UNIT

Honeywell's Communication, Navigation, and Surveillance (CNS) business unit is a leading provider of advanced avionics systems and solutions for the aerospace industry. Our products and services enable safer and more efficient air travel, enhancing the overall aviation experience for passengers and operators
. With a focus on innovation and customer satisfaction, we are dedicated to delivering cutting-edge technologies that shape the future of aviation.  our

website
.

Honeywell is an equal opportunity employer. Qualified applicants will be considered without regard to age, race, creed, color, national origin, ancestry, marital status, affectional or sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, disability, nationality, sex, religion, or veteran status.  

.

•   Assist in the development and testing of radar algorithms and embedded software for weather applications
•   Collaborate with the team to troubleshoot and resolve technical issues related to embedded software
•   Analyze radar data and provide insights for improving radar performance
•   Document and present research findings and project updates


YOU MUST HAVE

YOU MUST HAVE

•   Pursuing or recently completed an Mtech degree in Electrical Engineering, Electronics, or a related field
•   Strong knowledge of radar signal processing and data analysis
•   Proficiency in programming languages such as MATLAB, Python, C, and C++
•   Experience or knowledge of embedded software development

WE VALUE
  
•   Familiarity with weather radar systems and meteorological concepts
•   Experience with radar hardware and software tools
Intern Masters Software Engineer –

As an Intern Masters Software Engineer at Honeywell, you will have the opportunity to acquire practical experience in the design and development of embedded software using C/C++. Additionally, you would also potentially develop AI/ML tools utilizing scripting languages such as Python

. You will work closely with our team of experienced engineers to contribute to the development of cutting-edge embedded systems and/or tools. This internship will provide you with valuable industry experience and the opportunity to work on innovative projects in the aerospace industry.
You will report directly to Control Systems team lead and work out of our Bangalore, India location.

In this role, you will have the opportunity to make a significant impact by contributing to the development of embedded software and/or tools that power Honeywell's Aerospace Environmental Control System products. You will work on projects that involve designing, coding, testing, and debugging embedded software and AI/ML tools
. You will also collaborate with cross-functional teams to define system requirements and ensure the successful completion of software projects.

•   Collaborate with experienced engineers to design and develop embedded software solutions and AI/ML based tools
•   Contribute to the testing and debugging of software
•   Work with cross-functional teams to define software requirements
•   Ensure the timely completion of software projects


In this role, you will have the opportunity to:

•   Passion for innovation and continuous learning


ABOUT HONEYWELL

Honeywell International Inc. (Nasdaq: HON) invents and commercializes technologies that address some of the world’s most critical challenges around energy, safety, security, air travel, productivity, and global urbanization

. We are a leading software-industrial company committed to introducing state of the art technology solutions to improve efficiency, productivity, sustainability, and safety in high growth businesses in broad-based, attractive industrial end markets. Our products and solutions enable a safer, more comfortable, and more productive world, enhancing the quality of life of people around the globe.
THE BUSINESS UNIT

Honeywell Control Systems (CS) business unit provides a wide range of products and value-adding services to Honeywell Aerospace customers, including aircraft manufacturers and operators, and agencies of the U.S. government. The business develops and manufactures air and thermal systems, mechanical components, and wheels and braking systems
. Every 5 seconds, an aircraft lands with Honeywell Control Systems products.

Honeywell is an equal opportunity employer. Qualified applicants will be considered without regard to age, race, creed, color, national origin, ancestry, marital status, affectional or sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, disability, nationality, sex, religion, or veteran status.

Job Title: Data Science Intern - Advanced Analytics
Job Summary:

Opportunity to work with World’s Leading Innovative Pharma Company
Location – Novartis Corporate Centre, Hyderabad for Novartis US
About the team:

About the team:
Novartis’ team of specialists in US, Insights & Decision Sciences are on a transformation journey, leveraging Data and Advanced Analytics to generate actionable insights for Novartis medicines impacting more than 200 million patients in US. The team is poised to enable easier, faster and reliable decisions for US Novartis.
Job Title: Advanced Analytics Intern

Job Title: Advanced Analytics Intern
Intern role and responsibilities:

This internship role involves collecting, organizing, and interpreting data using statistical tools, programming languages, and visualization techniques. Responsibilities will include data cleaning and preparation, identifying market trends, improving business strategies, and developing easy-to-interpret reports
. This role plays a crucial role by transforming raw data into actionable insights, helping US Novartis make informed decisions and drive growth.

Ideal Candidate Profile:
Education: Masters/ bachelor’s in technology/ life-sciences/ management

Communication: Ability to present findings and collaborate with team members effectively
Critical Thinking: Strong analytical and problem-solving to interpret data and make informed decisions
Presentation: Effective story boarding of findings to US Colleagues
Values and Behaviors:
Ability to thrive in ambiguous, fast-paced corporate environments and adapt to evolving business requirements.

Ability to manage own workload and adhere to deadlines under supervision.
Demonstrates accountability and initiative
Approaches tasks with mutual respect, integrity, and embraces diversity, collaboration and transparency
Why apply? 
You can find everything you need to know about our benefits and rewards in the Novartis Life Handbook. https://www.novartis.com/careers/benefits-rewards
Why Novartis?

Our purpose is to reimagine medicine to improve and extend people’s lives and our vision is to become the most valued and trusted medicines company in the world. How can we achieve this? With our people. It is our associates that drive us each day to reach our ambitions. Be a part of this mission and join us! Learn more here: https://www.novartis.com/about/strategy/people-and-culture
Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion: Novartis is committed to building an outstanding, inclusive work environment and diverse teams' representative of the patients and communities we serve.

Join our Novartis Network: If this role is not suitable to your experience or career goals but you wish to stay connected to hear more about Novartis and our career opportunities, join the Novartis Network here: https://talentnetwork.novartis.com/network

chunks.content: Participate as a Trainee Engineer in NOCC Engineering team at Novartis Hyderabad.

Responsible for the operational support to business functions in managing contractors and external services as well represent an interface between internal community and external partners. To be acted as a single point of contact for all in accordance with legislation, internal regulations, good practices and business objectives via NOCC Engineering project team.

In depth knowledge of Engineering subjects, ability to use systems and tools (e.g., MS office, Excel, etc.) for documentation and reporting. 
Participate in the review meetings with users, cross functional team and external vendors. Also contribute to review process improvements and provide the innovative solutions to process issues.

Contribute in the preparation of project assignments, timely compilation of tender documents, technical bid analysis, preparation of technical solutions within the legal framework, internal quality and HSE requirements. Perform other tasks as assigned by the supervisor, and tasks based on a specific appointment.
Creating purchase orders and ordering equipment in SAP/ESHOP.

Care and maintenance of electronic databases (SharePoint).
Responsibility for ensuring the consistency and quality of procedures and documentation. SPOC to the external service provider regarding operational processes related to external employees (announcements of new employees, assuming new roles, replacements, etc.).

Providing support to the Training & Learning organization in defining the training that will help the external associates to obtain their qualifications.
Management and review of training roles for all external colleagues in the field of work and regular monitoring of the education of external colleagues and ensuring the consistency of training.

Ensuring that updated production documents are sent to relevant external colleagues for the purpose of education (reading and understanding) and transferring knowledge to colleagues and, if necessary, conducting training (OJT) for relevant colleagues. Support for ensuring the implementation of external services according to defined KPIs.

Collaborate with internal users and relevant line functions to bring the common understanding on the scope of the work with an emphasis on GMP, Safety and cost optimization. Work in conjunction with the relevant line functions to complete the project deliverables in time and in full.
Consistency and quality of procedures and documentation.
PO completion on time, no critical observations.

Job Title: Technical Support Intern
Location: Bangalore
Job Type: Internship (Full-time)
Duration: 10 months
Working Model: Hybrid
Reports To: Technical Support Manager
Overview

This position, under the general direction of both the supervisor and manager, provides technical support for our award-winning K- 12 software systems. This position provides world-class solutions-oriented technical support with a strong focus on customer service that is designed to maximize customer satisfaction

. This position requires the employee to become proficient with all aspects of the application software functionality in order to accurately analyse, troubleshoot, diagnose and resolve software or system-related issues. This position will interact with customers via telephone and written internet-based communication.

Responsibilities:
Responds promptly to incoming technical support requests via phone, email, and chat, addressing hardware, software, networking, and system-related issues.
Troubleshoots and resolves end-user problems by identifying root causes, researching solutions, and providing thorough follow-up; escalates complex issues to engineering when necessary.

Collaborates closely with engineering teams to support escalated issues, providing technical context and ongoing updates to ensure resolution.
Collaborates with developers to communicate software defects and recommend usability or functional improvements.
Research customer data issues, perform multiple queries, and escalate case if needed
Expanded Scope of Work:

Expanded Scope of Work:
Assist in the design, development, testing, and maintenance of web/mobile applications.
Write clean, maintainable code under the supervision of senior developers. Debug and fix minor issues and bugs in existing applications.

Participate in code reviews and follow established coding standards. Document features, processes, or APIs to support future development and knowledge sharing. 
Logs and manages support tickets in a problem management system, maintaining accurate documentation for issue tracking and knowledge sharing.

Participates in the incident management process, ensuring timely response, coordination, and communication for service-impacting issues.
Designs and implements lightweight automation tools to streamline repetitive support tasks and improve team efficiency.

Web Application Development (Frontend & Backend): Help build and maintain web applications, working on both the user interface (what users see) and the backend (how the app works behind the scenes, like handling data and user requests).

AI Chatbot Tool Development: Support the development of chatbots that use AI to answer questions, guide users, or perform tasks automatically, improving the user experience on websites or apps.
Requirements:
Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite
Excellent attention to detail and time management

Exceptional customer service and conflict resolution abilities
Capacity to manage a high-volume workload and adapt to shifting priorities and interruptions

chunks.section: NOVA 2025 - SHPP GAPT - Fatigue Failure Prediction.docx
chunks.content:
NOVA 2025 - Applications
Empirical procedure for predictive modeling of fatigue failure for filled resins at application level
Mention the SBU/Department/Function name.
SHPP/GAPT
Mention your preferred academic background of Study
Master’s in mechanical engineering or Polymer Science
Select Work Location
Bengaluru
Gurugram
Vadodara
Mumbai
Please outline the project Scope in detail
Objectives:
chunks.filename: NOVA 2025 - SHPP GAPT - Fatigue Failure Prediction.docx

chunks.section: NOVA 2025 - SHPP GAPT - Fatigue Failure Prediction.docx
chunks.content:
Objectives:
•	Simulating fatigue failure in polymers is an ongoing area of research.
•	While failure prediction at material level is in advanced stage of understanding, life prediction at application level is a relatively unexplored area.
•	Application-level life prediction has been studied for an unfilled grade in an earlier intern project.
chunks.filename: NOVA 2025 - SHPP GAPT - Fatigue Failure Prediction.docx

chunks.section: NOVA 2025 - SHPP GAPT - Fatigue Failure Prediction.docx
chunks.content:
•	This project will attempt to build empirical relationships for fatigue failure for filled grades, specifically for glass filled polyetherimide.
Work Scope:
•	Study, summarize and present current state-of-art in fatigue failure prediction for filled polymers.
chunks.filename: NOVA 2025 - SHPP GAPT - Fatigue Failure Prediction.docx

chunks.section: NOVA 2025 - SHPP GAPT - Fatigue Failure Prediction.docx
chunks.content:
•	Finalize the most suitable predictive method, tool, or procedure to fill the gap in life prediction at application level for filled polymers.
•	Conduct fatigue experiments to generate data for empirical modeling.
•	Predictions using the improved tool/method application level.
•	Validate at application level with physical experimentation.
•	Write a procedure document.
chunks.filename: NOVA 2025 - SHPP GAPT - Fatigue Failure Prediction.docx

chunks.section: NOVA 2025 - SHPP GAPT - Fatigue Failure Prediction.docx
chunks.content:
•	Write a procedure document.
Please select the type of internship
Management interns - 2 Months
Engineering interns - 6 to 10 Months
CS intern - 12 to 15 Months
CA interns - 12 to 15 Months
Other technical interns
No of Interns required
1
Assigned project lead/mentor for the intern
Subhransu Mohapatra
Please mention any other added Skill sets required for the project
chunks.filename: NOVA 2025 - SHPP GAPT - Fatigue Failure Prediction.docx

chunks.section: NOVA 2025 - SHPP GAPT - Fatigue Failure Prediction.docx
chunks.content:
•	Specialization in FEA and Structural Design with exposure to polymers
Cost Centre owner approval received
YES
NO
Additional comments (if any) that may be useful
chunks.filename: NOVA 2025 - SHPP GAPT - Fatigue Failure Prediction.docx

chunks.content:
NOVA 2025 - Applications
Moisture Absorption Study of Polymer Materials
Mention the SBU/Department/Function name.
SHPP/GAPT
Mention your preferred academic background of Study
Master’s in Mechanical engineering / Applied mechanics / Material science / Polymer science
Select Work Location
Bengaluru
Gurugram
Vadodara
Mumbai
Please outline the project Scope in detail
Objectives:

Objectives:
•	Understand the basic principle of moisture absorption in polymers
•	Understand the effect of moisture on polymer properties, physical, mechanical and long term
•	Develop a methodology to predict polymer performance after moisture absorption
Work Scope:
•	Conduct lab experiments to understand how the polymers absorb moisture, what happens when one side of the polymer is painted

•	Develop a methodology to simulate this phenomenon using predictive tools.
•	Evaluate the change in mechanical properties due to moisture absorption
•	Develop a methodology to simulate the change in mechanical properties using predictive tools.
Please select the type of internship
Management interns - 2 Months
Engineering interns - 6 to 10 Months
CS intern - 12 to 15 Months

CS intern - 12 to 15 Months
CA interns - 12 to 15 Months
Other technical interns
No of Interns required
1
Assigned project lead/mentor for the intern
Vasudev Nilajkar
Please mention any other added Skill sets required for the project
•	Domain knowledge in Mechanics of materials
•	Enthusiasm to do laboratory experiments

•	Team player, ability to work with a cross-functional team environment
Cost Centre owner approval received
YES

chunks.section: NOVA 2025 - SHPP GAPT - Performance Prediction of Optical Lenses & Waveguides.docx
chunks.content:
NOVA 2025 - Applications
Performance Prediction of Optical Lenses & Waveguides
Mention the SBU/Department/Function name.
SHPP/GAPT
Mention your preferred academic background of Study
Master’s in Photonics/Physics
Select Work Location
Bengaluru
Gurugram
Vadodara
Mumbai
Please outline the project Scope in detail
Objectives:
chunks.filename: NOVA 2025 - SHPP GAPT - Performance Prediction of Optical Lenses & Waveguides.docx

chunks.section: NOVA 2025 - SHPP GAPT - Performance Prediction of Optical Lenses & Waveguides.docx
chunks.content:
Objectives:
•	Understand the configurations and trends of MPO & CPO (on-board optics) and diffractive lenses.
•	Develop & validate analytical and simulation methods to predict the performance of thermoplastic lenses in various optical communication elements/configurations.
chunks.filename: NOVA 2025 - SHPP GAPT - Performance Prediction of Optical Lenses & Waveguides.docx

chunks.section: NOVA 2025 - SHPP GAPT - Performance Prediction of Optical Lenses & Waveguides.docx
chunks.content:
•	The properties of the thermoplastic materials (birefringence) are also a function of the processing conditions and these also need to be understood, characterized and included in the modeling.
Work Scope:
•	Understand and clearly explain the physics of the light transmission through thermoplastic materials
•	Perform literature search, benchmarking and baseline studies/analysis.
chunks.filename: NOVA 2025 - SHPP GAPT - Performance Prediction of Optical Lenses & Waveguides.docx

chunks.section: NOVA 2025 - SHPP GAPT - Performance Prediction of Optical Lenses & Waveguides.docx
chunks.content:
•	Learn the predictive tools required for the project

chunks.filename: NOVA 2025 - SHPP GAPT - Surface Feature Sensitivity in RF Applications.docx

chunks.section: NOVA 2025 - SHPP GAPT - Surface Feature Sensitivity in RF Applications.docx
chunks.content:
Objectives:
Understand the behavior of EM waves, on interaction with periodic structures (e.g.: surface roughness, pyramid structure etc.) of different length scale. 
The behavior of the EM waves on different surfaces can change with varying frequencies. The physics governing these behavior needs to be understood, characterized, and implemented in the modelling.
chunks.filename: NOVA 2025 - SHPP GAPT - Surface Feature Sensitivity in RF Applications.docx

chunks.section: NOVA 2025 - SHPP GAPT - Surface Feature Sensitivity in RF Applications.docx
chunks.content:
Develop & validate analytical and simulation methods to predict the system level performance with these features for specified application.
Work Scope:
•	Thorough research to understand the physics of wave interaction with different surfaces features.
•	Perform literature search, benchmarking, and baseline studies/analysis.
•	Learn the predictive tools required for the project.
chunks.filename: NOVA 2025 - SHPP GAPT - Surface Feature Sensitivity in RF Applications.docx

chunks.section: NOVA 2025 - SHPP GAPT - Surface Feature Sensitivity in RF Applications.docx
chunks.content:
•	Develop the predictive models to understand and evaluate the effect of these surface features for specified applications (Eg: ADAS Radome/Absorber, Antennas etc.)
•	Work with team members to prototype and test the design concept.
•	Validate the CAE model with the test results.
•	Documentation and reporting

chunks.content:
NOVA 2025 - Applications
Web Analytics for SABIC Customer Facing Portals
Mention the SBU/Department/Function name.
SHPP/GAPT
Mention your preferred academic background of Study
Data Science, AI/ML, Computer Science
Select Work Location
Bengaluru
Gurugram
Vadodara
Mumbai
Please outline the project Scope in detail
Objectives:

Objectives:
•	Customers in the digital era have information at their fingertips about where to find goods and services, what to buy and how much to expect to pay. They can find the perfect products for their needs, and therefore, organizations must do everything they can to serve the right products and marketing campaigns to their audience.

•	To do this, organizations can use customer analytics tools to understand their customers.
•	The goal of customer analytics is to create a single, accurate view of an organization's customer base, which can inform decisions about how to best acquire and retain future customers. It can also identify high-value customers and suggest proactive ways to interact with them.

•	Organizations that deeply understand their customers' buying habits and lifestyle preferences can more easily predict those people's behavior and, therefore, can optimize the customer journey.
Work Scope:
•	Study SABIC’s customer facing portals and user tracking data.
•	Study best practices in web and customer analytics.

•	Build web and customer analytics plan for SABIC customer facing portals to identify, attract and retain most profitable customers.
•	Document the steps, train the team and handover the AI model to data team for live deployment

Position: Associate Consultant, Expert Services (Professional Services), IAM/IGA
Location: Bengaluru | Fulltime - Hybrid
Join Saviynt – Pioneers in Intelligent & Smart Identity Security

At Saviynt, we are redefining the future of identity security. As a leading provider of intelligent, cloud-first Identity Security solutions, we empower organizations to protect their most critical assets. Our innovative platform leverages advanced AI and machine learning to deliver unparalleled insights and automation, ensuring our clients stay ahead in a rapidly evolving digital landscape.

Good understanding of identity governance and administration principles is a plus
Training or proven hands-on experience in implementing (design, development, testing and deployment) any leading IGA products in the market is a plus
Knowledge of LDAP or Active Directory or Azure Active Directory is a plus. 
Why Saviynt?

Why Saviynt?
Innovative Environment: Be part of a team that’s at the forefront of identity security technology.
Professional Growth: Opportunities for continuous learning and career advancement.
Collaborative Culture: Work with a talented and energetic team in a supportive and dynamic environment.
Impactful Work: Contribute to solutions that protect some of the world’s largest and most complex organizations.

Job Title: Embedded Engineer - Intern

Department: RT&I - Software Domain

Conduct cutting-edge research and development in embedded software systems, focusing on RISC-V architecture, secure boot, and hypervisor technologies.
Contribute to writing detailed technical specifications, research papers, and publications related to secure boot and hypervisors for RISC-V platforms.

Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, implement, and evaluate embedded software solutions on RISC-V platforms.
Develop and test embedded software on evaluation boards using Yocto and similar development tools.
Design and implement secure boot mechanisms and low-level firmware for embedded systems.

Contribute to the development and evaluation of open-source hypervisors for RISC-V platforms.
Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in embedded systems, RISC-V architecture, and security technologies.

Qualifications:
Currently pursuing a Mtech / PhD in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or a related field, with a focus on embedded systems, computer architecture, or cybersecurity.
Strong knowledge of embedded software systems, operating systems, and computer architecture.
Proficiency in programming languages such as C/C++ and assembly.

Experience with evaluation boards and embedded development tools, particularly Yocto.
Hands-on experience in secure firmware development, including UEFI.
Strong understanding of RISC-V architecture and secure boot mechanisms.
Familiarity with open-source hypervisors (e.g., Xen, KVM) and virtualization concepts.
Experience with performance analysis, optimization, and debugging.

Experience with secure boot systems and bootloaders in embedded systems.
Familiarity with RISC-V security extensions (e.g., TrustZone) and hardware security concepts (e.g., cryptographic algorithms).
Experience in hypervisor design and virtualization technologies.
Knowledge of hardware security principles and cryptographic algorithms used in embedded systems.

Experience with version control systems like Git.
Familiarity with modern software development practices and tools.

Ways to Stand Out From the Crowd:
Demonstrated experience in contributing to open-source projects, especially related to RISC-V, hypervisors or embedded systems.
Published research in the areas of embedded systems, security, or virtualization technologies.
Experience working with advanced RISC-V platforms or secure boot systems in a real-world context.

Strong interest in cutting-edge research and development, particularly in RISC-V architecture and security features.
A portfolio of successful projects or collaborations in embedded systems or secure software development.
JREQ185628 – Data & Analytics Intern

1. Data Collection and Cleaning: Assist in gathering data from various sources and perform data cleaning to ensure accuracy and reliability.
2. Data Analysis: Support the analysis of datasets to identify trends, patterns, and insights that can inform business decisions.
3. Reporting and Visualization: Help create reports and visualizations to effectively communicate data findings to stakeholders.

4. Model Development: Support the development and testing of machine learning models and algorithms to solve specific business problems.
5. Data Stewardship: Collaborate with data stewards to support data governance initiatives and address data-related issues.
6. Data Policy Support: Assist in the development and implementation of data governance policies, standards, and procedures.

7. Data Quality Monitoring: Help monitor and assess the quality of data across various systems to ensure accuracy and consistency.
8. Research and Development: Conduct research on new data tools, techniques, and best practices to improve data analysis processes.

9. Collaboration: Work closely with team members and other departments to understand their data needs and provide support in data-related projects.
10. Documentation: Assist in documenting processes, methodologies, and findings to ensure knowledge retention and easy reference.

Exposure to Tools and Technologies: Give interns the opportunity to work with industry-standard tools and technologies, such as Python, R, SQL, and data visualization software.
Collaborative Environment: Foster a supportive and inclusive workplace where interns can collaborate with team members and contribute ideas.
Feedback and Evaluation: Offer regular feedback and performance evaluations to help interns understand their strengths and areas for improvement.
